title: Context Size
description: Context window size for MLX inference

title: Batch Size
description: Maximum number of concurrent requests to batch (0 = disabled)

title: Batch Timeout (ms)
description: Maximum time to wait for batch to fill (milliseconds)

title: Continuous Batching
description: Enable continuous batching for higher throughput

title: Prefix Caching
description: Enable KV cache reuse for repeated prefixes

title: Auto unload model
description: Automatically unload other models when loading a new one

title: Timeout (seconds)
description: Maximum time to wait for model to load
